1.content:
"What the..." Josh said in a tense tone.
He looked around, unsure of where he was.
"Shit I'm cold!" he shook, looking down he saw his limbs were made of white fluffy snow.
"Oh my god! I'm a snowman!" he shouted. He silenced his voice upon hearing some chatter off in the distance. Upon further inspection he realized he was currently near a university. His house was miles from this place.

How am I going to get home without anyone seeing me? he thought to himself.
He made his way to the corner of one of the buildings and peaked around the corner.

His frozen heart skipped a beat when he saw...
1.title: What the...

choices: ...a teenager with a mischievous look on her face
...a college senior with a pissed off look on her face
...a twenty-something woman with a somewhat friendly look on her face
12.content:
...the snowman saw a single woman standing a few feet away, texting on her phone. Her back was turned so there was no way of knowing if she looked friendly or not.

Josh decided it best to get her attention. He grabbed a part of his snowy body and balled it up in his hands.

THUNK!

The snowball hit the woman softly on the back. She turned towards him and he saw that she was...
12.title: One woman

121.content:
"What was that...oh my god!" the teen girl squealed.

She quickly pranced towards the living snowman.

Josh immediately began to regret his choice in the matter. He put his hands up, hoping to calm her down and not draw anymore attention to his current situation.

"Are you moving? Can you talk? Is this a dream?" she rattled off rhetorical questions as she poked Josh's cold snowball body.

"Uh, yes! All of that...I mean no...you're not dreaming but..." Josh stammered, "I really need to get home and then get back to normal. Can you maybe give me a ride?"

"Hmmm..." the girl said, tapping her chin with a finger, "I suppose I might be able to do that...but not right now."

Josh's heart sank, "Why not right now?"

"Because silly! It's rather warm out for a snowman! I think the best thing to do is to get you inside until after dark...then I can give you a ride. We don't want you melting too soon." she said with a giggle.

Josh hadn't realized it before, but it was rather warm for a snowman, which only added more questions as to how he got like this.

"You can stay in my house until then..." she said, "I'm Cindy, by the way"

There was something about the girl that made Josh uneasy and in his current form he had to be sure not to take any risks.

"Ok, Cindy...let's..."
121.title: ...a teenager with a mischievous look on her face

choices: Try to fight your way out
1211.content:
"You made the right choice, snowball!" Cindy said.

But Josh felt like maybe he just offered himself up to a horrible fate.

Cindy only lived about 50 feet away so it was quite easy to get there without drawing a crowd. She opened the door and Josh quickly stepped inside. A feeling a dread washed over him as Cindy closed the door...and locked it.

"Hope you don't mind if I turn the heat up..."

Josh turned around to see Cindy removing all of her clothing.
She began to step towards him, completely nude

"I've never fucked a snowman before." she giggled, "This is gonna be fun!"
1211.title: ...go into your house

info.brief_description: Josh wakes up to find himself transformed into a snowman. Melted by cruel sexy women.
info.description:
Josh wakes up and realizes he's been transformed into a snowman. Unsure of his surroundings, he tries to find his way home without attracting too much attention. He ends up coming face to face with a few women whose intentions might not be in his best interest.

Story contains several fetishes. Not suitable for everyone!

Contains:
Transformation.
Nudity.
Crushing.
Melting.
Sexual situations.
